attributes.additional_details: Without this over 2 million people will become disenfranchised so will not be able to vote.
attributes.background:
Next week the government will be introducing a Voter ID bill. 
If this is introduced then they should offer a free photo ID card that can be used to vote along with anything else that needs ID.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/595633
